questions.question: A conclusion that is BEST supported by this illustration is that the Columbian Exchange...

choices.answer: Increased the isolation between Europe and the Indians
Ended the slave trade
Led to the spread of diseases
Resulted in a decrease of trade

questions.question: What was a major reason for Spanish, French, and English voyagers to explore the New World?

choices.answer: teach American Indians about arts and science
wished to militarily control the city of Jerusalem
share their new industrial technology with the Indians
build a large empire

questions.question: Which factors did Europeans utilize in their favor when fighting American Indians?

choices.answer: Respect for American Indian traditions
Technological Inferiority
Climate and disease
Enlightenment and education

questions.question: Which Spanish conquistador traveled and searched for gold through present-day Georgia in 1540?

choices.answer: Hernán Cortes
Hernando de Soto
Francisco Pizarro
Juan Ponce de Leon

questions.question: Which was the MAIN reason Spain built Missions along Georgia’s Barrier Islands?

choices.answer: a staging point for attacking pirate ships
for defensive purposes against the English colonists
convert the Indian tribes to the Christian faith
centers of trade

questions.question: Great Britain believed the colony would provide them with raw materials to help their economy. This is called...

choices.answer: Nationalism
Mercantilism
Global Free Trade
Triangular Trade

questions.question: Who was MOST responsible for the creation of the Georgia colony?

choices.answer: James Oglethorpe
Robert Castell
Hernando de Soto
Dr. Samuel Nunez

questions.question: What course of action would King George II take to ensure the safety of the colonies?

choices.answer: Britain will give Spain its claim to disputed lands
Britain will offer the Creeks and other tribes the disputed land
Britain will create a colony (Georgia) to protect against the Spanish
Britain will create a colony to model free trade

questions.question: Which factor made Georgia’s summers more difficult for early Europeans?

choices.answer: Unusual plants and wildlife
The heat and humidity, along with insects
The earthquakes followed by volcanic eruptions
The unstable atmosphere with tornadoes and hurricanes

questions.question: Which of the following is the LEAST accurate statement about the city of Savannah?

choices.answer: Its symmetrical design is evidence by the layout of streets and parks
It was not populated and lived in until it was fully constructed
The city was planned and designed before land was cleared
The city was built along the Savannah River

questions.question: Which statement BEST describes Tomochichi’s and Mary Musgrove’s significance in creating Georgia?

choices.answer: Tomochichi’s skills as an interpreter assisted Mary Musgrove
Mary Musgrove stopped Tomochichi from his plan to kill the colonists
Mary Musgrove intercepted the Spanish secret plans to attack GA
Mary Musgrove’s mixed heritage allowed her to be an effective interpreter

questions.question: According to the Charter of 1732, King George II authorized James Oglethorpe and ____________________ to run the colony

choices.answer: Debtors
Parliament
Royal Governors
Board of Trustees

questions.question: These statements best describe the group of Georgia settlers known as the...

choices.answer: Salzburgers
Yamacraws
Malcontents
Highland Scots

questions.question: For what purpose did Oglethorpe recruit the Highland Scots to settle south of Savannah?

choices.answer: Highland Scots were excellent farmers
Highland Scots were expert boat builders
Highland Scots were fierce soldiers
Highland Scots were hard workers and master carpenters

questions.question: Which statement best describes Georgia as a royal colony?

choices.answer: ruled directly by the king through a royal governor
ruled directly by the king through a council of elected officials
ruled by an elected legislature that worked closely with the king
ruled by an elected governor that worked closely with the legislature

questions.question: Which of the following was NOT one of the policies the Malcontents were upset about?

choices.answer: Slavery was forbidden inside the colony
Women were not allowed to inherit land
Catholics were forbidden inside the colony
Colonist were required to grow grapes, olives, and mulberry trees

questions.question: Which group included a doctor as one of its members, treated and cured the colonists, and saved the colony?

choices.answer: Salzburgers
Yamacraws
Jews
Highland Scots

questions.question: Which statement is true when comparing the Trustee  period with the Royal period?

choices.answer: Colonists during the Trustee period were allowed slaves
Colonists during the Royal period were allowed slaves
Colonists during the Royal period could not own more than 500 acres of land
Colonists during the Trustee period could own unlimited amounts of land

questions.question: Which statement BEST describes the economic activities occurring in colonial Georgia?

choices.answer: Britain created the colony to growing cotton and peanuts
Britain created the colony to produce wine, silk, and indigo

questions.question: Why did Great Britain build Fort King George and Fort Frederica on the barrier islands?

choices.answer: To stop Georgia settlers from moving south into Florida.
To eliminate pirate ships that raided the colonial towns
To open up trade along the barrier islands with Native Americans
To prevent the Spanish from threatening and attacking the colony
